name: Going In Circles
description:
A game made for the Kenney Game Jam. The theme was Rotation.

Explore a cave that is rumoured to full of green gems that have some mysterious (rotating) properties.

It's very unfinished but hopefully playable! To see it all you'll need to enable full screen.

Use the arrow keys to move and space to jump. Collect all the green gems to win.

All assets from Kenney.

Music is 4th Mvt: Starry Evening by Ben Nestor
